tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor is great. The treatment was smooth, doctor explained everything. And the post treatment follow ups are also encouraging with all information shared
she explained everything very patiently and in detail. Cleared all my doubts and made sure I understand everything.
Dr. Srishti is attentive and takes time to thoroughly explains issues in detail, using past cases as examples.
Had gone for RCT, doctor was very understanding and recommended the right treatment, the entire treatment was very smooth and reasonable. She even followed up with me for post treatment care
She is treating the patients so good. She is giving good suggestions on the improvement of the teeth and I am so satisfied.
